name: A-round Beta, DEMO
description:
Hello, this is a game project I have been working on for a year now. It's called A-round, The full game will maybe release by the end of the year so stay tuned! Right now this is a demo of what I have completed so far, over time there will be new demos coming out on these dates below. There even is a playtest of a little bit of the demo released, feel free to comment on what you want in the game when the beta demo comes out! 

First A-round demo- 5/8/21, This was something I made a year ago

Second A-round demo- 5/24/22

Third A-round demo- 10/9/22

A-round release date-  12/28/22

---Clarifications---

. This is only a beta build so it will be buggy somewhat

. If you counter any bugs put them in the comments, trust me I will respond

. The demo has not been released yet, wait until 5/24/22 for it 

. The screenshots are still in beta so they are not final 

---More about Benzano547---

Hello, I'm Benzano547, I make youtube videos and video games, and I Sometimes stream on twitch.  If you want more links about me then here you go!

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcMfh0w0RqrD57RuT0V4fmA

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/benzano547

Discord: https://discord.gg/UBGGbtgQ8q

My website: https://sites.google.com/view/benzano547-announcements/home

I'm working on the project almost every day and I'm also working on other video games while I'm at it.
